reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Amazon Basics 8-Pack AA Alkaline Batteries, and I must say, they exceeded my expectations. Not only do these batteries offer long-lasting power, but they also come at an incredibly affordable cost.The cost of this 8-pack of AA batteries is truly impressive. Compared to other brands, these batteries provide excellent value for money without sacrificing quality. It's a cost-effective solution for powering a wide range of devices, from remote controls to toys, flashlights, and more.When it comes to performance, these batteries deliver. They provide a consistent and reliable power source, ensuring that my devices operate smoothly and efficiently. Whether I'm using them in high-drain devices or low-drain ones, these batteries offer long-lasting power that keeps my devices running for extended periods.One of the standout features of these batteries is their longevity. They have a shelf life of up to 10 years, which means I can stock up on them without worrying about them losing their power over time. This is especially convenient for those who like to have spare batteries on hand for emergencies or unexpected needs.The Amazon Basics AA Alkaline Batteries are also compatible with a wide range of devices. They fit snugly and securely, providing a reliable connection that ensures optimal performance. I appreciate that I can use these batteries interchangeably between different devices without any issues.Furthermore, these batteries are environmentally friendly. They are free from harmful substances such as mercury, cadmium, and lead, making them a safer choice for both my devices and the environment. It's good to know that I can power my devices while minimizing my ecological footprint.In summary, I highly recommend the Amazon Basics 8-Pack AA Alkaline Batteries for their long-lasting power, excellent performance, and remarkable cost. With their impressive shelf life and compatibility with various devices, these batteries are a reliable and cost-effective solution for all your power needs. Don't let drained batteries hold you back—power up with these reliable and affordable batteries! Very durable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ExactlyWhat we needed
reviews.reviewText: I bought laser tag guns for my neices and nephews last year for Christmas. I was thankful that I predicted the toys weren’t going to have batteries included and that the toys would be used enough we were going to need back up. It was perfect for our get together, keeping the kids entertained. They aren’t the best batteries but for group toys and just to have on hand I can’t complain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dependable Power for Everyday Needs!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Amazon Basics 20-Pack AA Alkaline Batteries, and I must say, I'm thoroughly impressed! These batteries provide long-lasting power that keeps my devices running smoothly for extended periods. Whether it's powering my TV remote, wireless mouse, or kid's toys, these batteries deliver consistent performance without fail. Plus, with the convenience of a 20-pack, I always have extras on hand for whenever I need them. Overall, I highly recommend these batteries for anyone looking for reliable, affordable power solutions for their everyday devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works Well For the Price
reviews.reviewText: The batteries were delivered quickly and promptly by Amazon. Packaging was not intact when it arrived, but the batteries are new. The batteries are long lasting. I've used them for remote controls and for kids toys. Obviously, the remote control batteries lasted a very long time. However, due to the nature of the toy (lights and sounds) and constant use, the battery only lasted about 3 months. For the price, these batteries are a good deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Power on a Budget
reviews.reviewText: Batteries delivers reliable and long-lasting power at 1.5 volts. With this budget-friendly option, you get a pack of dependable batteries that perform well in various devices. They're a practical choice for everyday use, ensuring your gadgets stay powered up without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does what it is supposed to:)
reviews.reviewText: There isn’t much to say about this product other than it does what it’s supposed to. It does last a long time, and they are a good price as well. Batteries like that are always needed for anything like my headlights that I use to help me do my business. I run a Christmas light company and often times and working in the dark, I’ll even finish off some jobs doing window cleaning in the dark and the headlight can help me complete it. We do dryer vent cleanings and also air duct cleanings to where it’s hard to see into the dark space and this helps me get a better idea of what I am looking at . Ultimately, I think this product is great and has helped me make more money for my business. In addition to that, I love rock, climbing, and sometimes we will use our headlamp with these batteries to finish off a good day of climbing. I’m crazy enough to ski in the trees as well, and trust these batteries to keep my headlight bright While I ski safely through the trees, or at least safely as you can ski through trees at night!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work well for the price
reviews.reviewText: So, Amazon batteries work well. I use them in kids toys, remotes etc. But when it comes to products like active pickups in a guitar or something you want to rely on for longevity, stick to one of the major brands. Maybe someone has done a batter longevity test with these vs say Duracell (my fav) or Energizer?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So glad Amazon has their own batteries - have used them with no issues. Long lasting and great value.
Dura mucho su carga , muy buenas seguire comprandolas

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen precio y se ven de calidad
reviews.reviewText: Las puedes usar donde no tenga gran demanda de descarga de energía, es decir controles, relojes básculas etc. se ven de calidad y económicas
Great value. Batteries are affordable, long lasting. Highly recommend
received with thanks and value for money

Lo mejor:¿Necesitas poder extra para tus juguetes electrónicos y gadgets? ¡Estas pilas son tu supercarga! Con 8 en el paquete, olvídate de quedarte sin energía. Son como el "energizante" secreto para tus dispositivos.Además, no te romperán la billetera. Son como la ganga energética, sin lujos innecesarios. Mantienen las cosas funcionando sin romper el banco.Lo peor:Como todo en la vida, estas pilas no son eternas. En algún momento, tendrás que decirles adiós. Pero, ¿quién no quiere un amor duradero? Aún así, no es un drama, todas las pilas alcalinas tienen una fecha de caducidad.En resumen, estas Amazon Basics AA son tus compañeras confiables para mantener todo encendido. Son la chispa de energía que necesitas en tu vida electrónica. ¡Agrega unas a tu carrito y mantén la diversión encendida! 💥💡😄
